import React from 'react'; import MarkdownHeader from './MarkdownHeader'; import LineBreak from './LineBreak'; import Section from './Section'; import Text from './Text'; import MarkdownButton from './MarkdownButton'; import Comment from './Comment'; import {contact } from '../utils/directory' import TabLink from './TabLink'; import ResumePDF from '../assets/documents/Resume.pdf'; function About() { return (
Hi! My name is Marc Vidal. I am a full stack software engineer, currently pursuing my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Carleton University, with my stream being in artificial intelligence and machine learning. This portfolio website is inspired by my favourite code editor, Visual Studio Code and created with React.js. I am always eager to learn. Right now, I am learning Swift and SwiftUI in hopes of publishing my own app on the App Store! Aside from my passion to apply my learning into code, my interests are playing basketball, sports cars, strategy games, collecting action figures, and swimming. I also love going on walks with my dog, Hershey! To reach out, see Contact.md.
[Download Resume]
I am constantly looking to expand my toolkit and am open to working with and learning new skills! Front-end: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React.js Back-end: Node.js, MongoDB, Express.js Languages: Python, Java Miscellaneous: Git, Figma, Object-Oriented Programming and Design, Full Stack Web Development, REST APIs
COMP1405, Intro To Computer Science I: 12.0/12.0 (A+) COMP1406, Intro To Computer Science II: 12.0/12.0 (A+) COMP1805, Discrete Structures I: 11.0/12.0 (A) MATH1104, Linear Algebra for Engineering and Science: 12.0/12.0 (A+)
) } export default About;
